Description of incident: Memorial Hermann Hospital is notifying patients of a data breach when they discovered a former employee accessed medical records of more than 10,000 patients.Reportedly the former employee had been accessing patient information for over severn years, December 2007 through July 2014, that were outside their normal job description. The information breached included patients' medical records, health insurance  information, Social Security numbers, names, addresses  and dates of birth. More Information:http://www.click2houston.com/news/memorial-hermann-hospital-employee-acc...
